title: Peter Piper's Prerogative
description:
It’s time to clear the docket! Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse talk about post-pandemic hugging, child-free adults dining at kids' pizza restaurants, central vacuum systems, artificial islands, Philadelphia accents, and much more! Plus the premiere of the song, "Gygax Departed," inspired by recent episode with guest Josh Gondelman, A Donut of One's Own.

LINKS DISCUSSED IN THIS EPISODE:

  • Visit bit.ly/gonegygaxgone for "Gygax Departed" by Mersona Non Grata
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn, John Hodgman)
